title: Tessera
description: A web application simulating a fully functional ticketing website

title: Books Database
description: A web application for holding your favorite books in a mysql database, connected to the google search API, deployed on an ec2 server

title: Geometry Calculator Web Application
description: A web application for calculating the areas of different shapes. Connected to YouTube to display educational videos

title: Snake
description: A snake game that was made in python and uploaded to itch.io

title: Top Down RPG
description: A top down RPG game, where a elf character has to fight and dodge enemies, while also avoiding losing health.

title: Visual Novel
description: A rough working version of a visual novel dating sim. The program allows the player to input a name, and make choices.
